channel.title: NPC killing problem
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i134.photobucket.com/albums/q114/woot_019/deaths.jpg[/img]
as you can see in this horrible picture... the spider is dying when it has a portion of it's health remaining... but sometimes, it is much worse. for example, a person might go up to kill a 60 hit point monster, hit a 20+ on it and it will die in one hit! but wait, this monster should have 40 hit points left. does anyone know how to fix this minor glitch? im using pimpscape by the way.

item.title: NPC killing problem
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

yes, if their hp was 0 it would just die in one hit every time. Im not sure why this happens, because when I am all alone with the NPC’s, they die after the correct hitpoints, but once someone else logs on and comes near me, they screw up…

Read full topic

item.title: NPC killing problem
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Did you change there HP in npc.cfg?

Read full topic
